selection1.name: Hand-crafted pea coat in cashmere double cloth with precious patch
selection1.description: Coziness, warmth and excellence come together in this new cashmere hand-finished outerwear jacket. The fabric’s comfortable, compact look is the result of a complex process that gives both sides of the piece the same appearance. The pronounced lapel, large hand pockets and contrasting horn button details stand out against the material’s very smooth, soft texture, while a precious monili tag illuminates the cuff with a radiant sparkling note.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Coats & Jackets
Handmade outerwear jacket

selection1.name: Cashmere and silk Diamond yarn sweater
selection1.description: Refined Brunello Cucinelli materials elevate the essential style of the cashmere and silk Diamond yarn V-neck sweater. The yarn combines the ultra soft texture provided by the natural fibers with the sparking touch of the small paillettes incorporated into the yarn, spreading a multitude of reflections along the garment’s surface. Comfortable proportions with slightly dropped shoulders are offered by the fit.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Knitwear
Cashmere and silk sweater

selection1.name: Techno wool flannel pleated track trousers
selection1.description: Brunello Cucinelli materials and workmanship enrich the style of these new techno wool flannel Pleated Track trousers. Sporty details such as the ribbed bottom and tailored elements like the pleats come together in the garment to create a sophisticated design. The lines are soft in the seat and gradually more tapered down the leg.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Pants
Flannel trousers

selection1.name: English rib lightweight cropped sweater in sparkling cashmere and silk
selection1.description: The excellence of natural yarns is combined with modern lines in this new lightweight Crop sweater in ribbed cashmere and silk Sparkling yarn. The cashmere and silk fibers enrich the glowing touch of the lamé thread, which creates shiny metallic reflections on the entire piece. The cropped silhouette pairs perfectly with contemporary looks.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Knitwear
Lightweight sweater

selection1.name: Cashmere sweater with monili
selection1.description: The iconic embellishment of the Brunello Cucinelli collections enriches the essential style of the pure cashmere crew-neck sweater. Shiny monili embroidery at the back of the neck adds a precious touch of sparkle. The garment offers regular proportions in both the bust and down the sleeves.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Knitwear
Cashmere sweater

selection1.name: Dyed soft denim tapered trousers with pleats and shiny tab
selection1.description: The plush texture of the garment-dyed Soft denim is paired with precious details to give life to these Tapered trousers, characterized by relaxed, modern proportions. The pleats, which start at the belt loops, create a soft fold that flows delicately down the fabric. On the edge of the rear pocket, a small label embroidered with rows of shiny monili completes these trousers with a delicate sparkling note.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Pants
Tapered trousers

selection1.name: Dyed denim boyfriend trousers with shiny tab
selection1.description: A lightweight texture and the faded look of dyed denim pairs perfectly with the proportions of these new Boyfriend trousers. The sophisticated look of this piece is completed by a shiny monili label on the back pocket, completing the style with an unexpected sparkling note.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Pants
Dyed denim trousers

selection1.name: Cotton and silk French terry trousers with shiny pocket
selection1.description: Refined Brunello Cucinelli materials marry with the casual style of the Travelwear line, dedicated to moments of relaxation and free time. The cotton and silk French Terry trousers are enriched with a precious detail: the edges of the pockets are embroidered with fine rows of shiny monili. A drawstring pull-on fit is comfortable both in the seat and along the leg.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Travelwear
French terry trousers

selection1.name: Classic denim relaxed trousers with shiny patch
selection1.description: Wide, straight lines characterize the relaxed silhouette of these new Classic denim trousers. The iconic embellishment of the Brunello Cucinelli collections illuminates the rear pocket with a shiny monili insert.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Denim
Denim trousers

selection1.name: Cashmere and wool English rib Dazzling & Sparkling cardigan with monili
selection1.description: A distinctly feminine and elegant aesthetic characterizes this new cashmere and wool Dazzling & Sparkling yarn cardigan. Its classic English rib knitting is enriched with shimmering reflections created by small paillettes and by the delicate shiny, metallic touch of lamé thread. The closure’s zipper pull is covered in a monili embroidery, the iconic embellishment of the Brunello Cucinelli collections, which helps to define the precious, glowing feel of the piece.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Knitwear
Cashmere and wool cardigan

selection1.name: Cotton English rib sweater with precious pocket loop
selection1.description: The iconic embellishment of the Brunello Cucinelli collections enriches the essential style of this new cotton English rib knit sweater. The excellence of natural yarns is combined with classic workmanship that accentuates the cozy feel of this piece. Inspired by utility wear, the season’s “Precious Pocket Loop” detail illuminates the chest pocket with an elegant, sparkling note.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear
Knitwear
Cotton sweater

selection1.name: Dazzling quilted top in stretch silk satin
selection1.description: A captivating and shimmering design characterizes this new stretch silk satin Dazzling Quilted top. The quilted motif and the lightweight padding that bring to mind the world of down jackets are combined with the delicate shiny touch of small paillettes spread over the entire surface. The soft elastic at the bottom and the silk-blend crêpe lining complete the garment with a stylish functional detail.
selection1.breadCrumbs:
Women
Ready to Wear

Satin top

selection1.name: Tropical luxury wool baggy cigarette trousers with shiny belt loops
selection1.description: Baggy lines are paired with a cigarette silhouette in these new Tropical Luxury wool Baggy Cigarette trousers. The soft elasticized waist is combined with a tapered leg, while a pleat runs gently along the entire length. A shiny monili embroidery illuminates the belt loops with a delicate sparkling note in true Brunello Cucinelli style.

selection1.name: Soft nappa leather utility jogger trousers
selection1.description: A sporty silhouette is interpreted in a novel way using refined leather in these new Utility Jogger trousers. Soft nappa makes them very supple and highlights the waistband and elasticized cuff details. The relaxed, informal lines define the very comfortable fit.

Utility trousers

selection1.name: Virgin wool fluid twill baggy sartorial trousers
selection1.description: A Baggy silhouette and tailored lines come together in these new virgin wool Fluid twill trousers. The soft double pleats at the top and the rear welt pockets represent classic details, while the cuffs at the bottom add a casual touch. The extremely soft, fluid lines define the comfortable fit.

selection1.name: Virgin wool, cashmere and silk dazzling stripes sweater
selection1.description: Refined Brunello Cucinelli details enrich the essential style of this new virgin wool, cashmere and silk Dazzling Stripes sweater. Illuminated with small tonal paillettes, colored horizontal stripes run across the garment and give it delicate sparking touches. The dropped shoulders and the rib knit cuffs and bottom band complete the sweater’s comfortable fit.

selection1.name: Garment-dyed cigarette trousers in stretch cotton drill with monili
selection1.description: In true Brunello Cucinelli style, a touch of sparkle enriches these garment-dyed stretch cotton drill cigarette trousers. Their classic, feminine and elegant silhouette is paired with the fabric’s lightweight, full texture. A precious detail completes this piece: a rear loop showcases an embroidery of fine rows of shiny monili.

selection1.name: Cashmere and silk dazzling mesh sweater
selection1.description: A light touch, elegant styling and a feminine feel give life to this new cashmere and silk Dazzling Mesh sweater. The classic net stitch knitting which plays with full and empty spaces is enriched with the shiny touch of small paillettes that spread delicate radiant reflections on the entire surface. The rib knit bottom band and collar complete the style of the garment with contrasting details.

selection1.name: English rib sweater in cashmere and silk Diamond yarn with precious button tab
selection1.description: The beauty of cashmere and silk is enriched with delicate sparkling details and sophisticated effects in this new Diamond yarn sweater. Elegant small paillettes spread shiny, very feminine reflections along the entire surface, while English rib knitting gives the garment a full effect. The open collar is enriched with an insert with button illuminated with a precious monili embroidery, adding a distinctly feminine touch to the sweater. The soft, relaxed lines define the very nice and comfortable fit.

selection1.name: Cotton corduroy kick flare trousers with shiny tab
selection1.description: A vintage feel is paired with a contemporary silhouette and distinct Brunello Cucinelli details in these new cotton corduroy Kick Flare trousers. The soft fabric is entirely covered with ribbing that gives the garment volume, particularly near the wide bottom that is typical of the flared silhouette. A precious label made of monili, the iconic embellishment of the Brunello Cucinelli collections, illuminates the outside edge of the rear pocket, completing the look with an unexpected sparkling note.
